simulated_ratings.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Anderson’s meticulous whimsy and bittersweet heart hit my sweet spot.

simulated_ratings.title: Rushmore (1998)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Offbeat melancholy and wit that charmed me even when it skews adolescent.

simulated_ratings.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox (2009)

simulated_ratings.title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life (1983)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Gloriously irreverent and uneven, but still packed with killer sketches.

simulated_ratings.title: Withnail & I (1987)

simulated_ratings.title: In Bruges (2008)

simulated_ratings.title: Fargo (1996)

simulated_ratings.title: The Big Lebowski (1998)
